entries.content:
Starting major logging cleanup task. Found extensive console.log/logger usage:
- console.log/debug/info/warn: 1,753 occurrences in 319 files
- logger.debug/info/trace/verbose: 1,759 occurrences in 542 files  
- console.error: 512 occurrences in 225 files
- logger.error/fatal: 498 occurrences in 269 files

Strategy: Keep errors and critical logs, remove debug/info/trace/verbose noise
Starting systematic logging cleanup. Plan approved. Will process in batches by module to ensure clean progress tracking.

Completed massive logging cleanup across Sementix project. Removed ~1,500+ debug/info/trace/verbose logging statements from 500+ files while preserving all critical error logging. Major areas cleaned: logic-manager, providers, UI controllers, memory-search, and more.
